main.name: Vaibhav Singh
main.description: Passionate about probabilistic machine learning and its applications. Currently working as Technology Strat at Goldman Sachs.
main.bio: Enthusiastic learner and like developing machine learning solutions to real scenario problems. Skilled in Python, Java, UI development, Deep Learning, Data Analysis, natural language processing, C, and C++. Strong research professional with a Master of Technology (M.Tech.) focused in Machine Learning from Indian Institute of Technology, Hyderabad.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Completed Master's thesis in convolutional Gaussian Processes. Attended the courses on Probabilistic Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Information Retrieval and Data Mining.

education.degree: Bachelor's Of Engineering, Electronics and Telecommunication

work.title: Strats Analyst
work.description: Worked as full-stack developer on web applications to automate the manual tasks done and removing the chances of human errors.

work.title: Teaching Assitant
work.description: Completed 2 year of teaching assistantship on multiple courses such as Bayesian data analysis, discrete mathematics and concurrent programming.

resume.skillmessage: Skills set include data analysis on text and images. Have worked on Python and Java for backend devlopment. For UI have some experience in angular.

projects.title: Convolutional Deep Gaussian Processes
projects.description: Introduced Convolutional Kernel in Deep Gaussian Processes

projects.title: Web Crawler
projects.description: Python Web Crawler to Parse data for websites and store them in files

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
